response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
